LanguageData.VFED_ImperialDefenses.label: defensas imperiales
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialDefenses.description: Crear megatorretas imperiales: Kontarion, Onager y Palintone, así como sus municiones.
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialDefenses.generalRules.rules: subject_story->engineered the mightiest defenses, deterring would-be conquerors with mere rumors of their power
subject_story->crafted turrets that combined ancient design principles with futuristic weaponry
subject_story->ensured the empire's borders were impregnable, standing as a testament to imperial ingenuity
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialWarSolutions.label: soluciones de guerra imperial - mortero
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialWarSolutions.description: Crear potentes obuses imperiales, como con metralla, perforación de armaduras y de racimo.
LanguageData.VFED_ImperialWarSolutions.generalRules.r: subject_story->innovated artillery ammunition that turned battlefields to their advantage with a single salvo
subject_story->developed shells that could pierce the toughest armors or scatter enemies with relentless shrapnel
subject_story->transformed the empire's artillery into a force capable of dictating the terms of engagement
LanguageData.VFED_RemoteDemolition.label: soluciones de guerra imperial - trampas
LanguageData.VFED_RemoteDemolition.description: Construir trampas explosivas avanzadas con un mecanismo de detonación remota.
LanguageData.VFED_RemoteDemolition.generalRules.rules: subject_story->pioneered the use of remotely controlled explosives, changing the dynamics of siege warfare
subject_story->crafted traps that could be detonated at the perfect moment, creating chaos among enemy ranks
subject_story->turned the battlefield into a meticulously controlled environment, where every step could be the last
subject_gerund->elevating the element of surprise to an art form
